overview: The film tells the story of six gay men that were born in the days of the establishment of the State of Israel. Their stories serve as the filmâ€™s background for the depiction of the clandestine and undocumented lives of homosexuals in Israel during the 1960-70s; From the time that their sexual identity was considered illegal and a mental illness, up until 1979, when a few brave ones dared to go public and demonstrate for their rights, as the history of the Gay community in Israel began to be told and documented.
title: We Were the Others
